item.title: WebWork Authoring Tips
item.description: WebWork Text Display Languages Original way using TEXT(EV3()) Example: TEXT(EV3(<<'END_TEXT')); The material in this section is collected into a string which is then passed to the EV3 (evaluation 3 ) routine which handles processing of the sections in curly braces, then does interpolation, and finally processes the LaTeX commands. END_TEXT **Remark:** In the example two pg macros were used TEXT() and EV3(). Both macros are defined in PGbasicmacros.
